post.content:
The development team at the MXC Foundation continues to innovate, create and update with the latest exciting Supernode release, [MXC Supernode 3.0.0](https://blog.mxc.org/mxc-in-korea-russia-india)!

The reason for this recent Supernode 3.0.0 release is to keep MXC Supernodes highly functional and intuitive for both MXC hodlers and general users alike. Currently, MXC Supernodes allow for multifunctionality, where users can stake MXC token as well as process data, allowing for improved performance for M2 Pro miners and thus increased mined block rewards.

Furthermore, the Supernode 3.0.0 release has a cleaner code process and increased back-end functionalities that allow for easier and more efficient Supernode maintenance. This update will ultimately serve MXC users well into the future as it reduces Supernode downtime and allows for faster seamless updates. Currently the MXC Supernodes are facilitating multiple transactions from the highly successful MXC staking options offering 3, 6, 9, 12 up to 24 month Crypto staking reward options, as well as high-level users, M2 Pro miner users who can view, manage and mine token on the go, thanks to the DataDash App.  

MXC continues to build upon the impressive start to the MXC Supernode platform. Currently there are over 12 Supernodes across the globe from Korea, China, Europe, Australia (Oceania), Asia and North America. 

Development for the MXC team will continue to focus on Supernodes as well as the DataDash App functionality which has fast become a cornerstone of the MXC Foundation and the MXC token.  

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The MXC Foundation is a purpose-built Blockchain Foundation, based in Berlin. Our mission is to inspire fast, efficient, decentralized data exchanges using LPWAN (Low Power Wide Area Network) and Blockchain technology. Want to learn more about LPWAN? 
Watch the “What is LPWAN?” Introduction Video
Or visit our LPWAN partner site: WhatIsLPWAN.com for more information
post.metaDescription: MXC Supernode 3.0.0 is released. It has a cleaner code process and increased back-end functionalities that allow for easier and more efficient Supernode maintenance.
